desc: Sailing tactics kits include boats, flags, regatta elements and buoys with magnets. The boat kits are an ideal tool for teaching racing tactics and rules for sailors. Great tool also for racing and protest committees. The regatta signal flags kit contains most common ISAF flags. All items are waterproof and 3D printed.

layout.text: Cool products for sailors and windsurfers

Sailing kits, accessories and boat and windsurfing parts
Waterproof and 3D printed
